subtitle: Average Directional Index — strength of a trend (not its direction).

measures.how_to_read: > 25 often indicates a meaningful trend; < 20 weak/no trend.
measures.caveats: ADX rises in both up and down trends; pair with direction filter.

step_by_step: Filter setups only when ADX above threshold

assistant_hints: ADX measures strength, not direction — combine with trend filter (e.g., EMA).
Common threshold ~25 for ‘trend on’; adjust by timeframe.
Avoid micro timeframes where noise inflates readings.
Use to gate strategies rather than time entries.
beginner_summary: Average Directional Index — strength of a trend (not its direction).
